actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to expand the boundaries of the San Antonio Missions National Historical Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to expand the boundaries of San Antonio Missions National Historical Park, Texas, into the Potential Boundary area, and makes necessary sums available for the development of essential public facilities in the Park (currently such funding is limited to $500,000).

titles.title: A bill to expand the boundaries of the San Antonio Missions National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
